title: Pilot
description: When a body is found on the bridge connecting El Paso and Juarez, two detectives, one from the United States and one from Mexico, must work together to hunt down a serial killer operating on both sides of the border.

title: Calaca
description: Marco and Sonya investigate the body from the bridge. Frye learns that the Killer isn't done with him. Charlotte makes an unwelcome discovery on her property.

title: Rio
description: Sonya and Marco race to track down a prime suspect who could lead them to the lone desert survivor. Charlotte confronts an unexpected visitor determined to keep business as usual.

title: Maria of the Desert
description: The clock ticks as Maria's broadcast continues. Sonya searches for the girl's location. Against protocol, Marco works a unique ransom angle. A powerful Juarez force crosses the border.

title: The Beast
description: Sonya and Marco suspect a cover-up. Charlotte goes to Marco for advice. A troubled girl seeks adventure in Juarez. A visitor stops by Linder's apartment.

title: ID
description: Sonya bonds with a key witness from the case. Marco uncovers Sonya and Hank's past. Charlotte calls on an old friend for help.

title: Destino
description: The EPPD corners their prime suspect. Charlotte questions Ray's true intentions. Linder crosses the border and takes on his most difficult case yet.

title: Vendetta
description: Sonya pursues a cold lead despite Marco's insistence that it's a dead end. Charlotte finds out that Ray has jeopardized her ranch.

title: The Beetle
description: Marco reconnects with a friend from his past and races to save his family. Charlotte responds to her biggest threat. Linder reveals his true feelings.

title: Old Friends
description: Showdown on the bridge as the Killer reveals his endgame.

title: Take the Ride, Pay the Toll
description: Showdown on the bridge as the Killer reveals his endgame.

title: All About Eva
description: Sonya uses Linder's latest problem to repair her relationship with Marco. Charlotte forms an unlikely alliance.

title: The Crazy Place
description: Sonya and Marco search for a missing girl. Charlotte meets someone who knows too much about her new business venture. Marco makes a decision that could change everything.

title: Yankee
description: Sonya meets a man connected to her past as Marco discovers he is no longer safe in his own department. Frye and Adriana investigate the origins of the "money house." A mysterious woman crosses The Bridge into El Paso.

title: Ghost of a Flea
description: A bizarre killing attracts attention on both sides of the border. Frye & Adriana find more than they bargained for with their first lead. Eleanor enlists the help of a young boy.

title: Sorrowsworn
description: Sonya and Marco start working together in the hunt for Eleanor Nacht. Linder pays a visit to Eva. Charlotte and Ray begin fearing for their lives after losing one of Fausto Galvan's shipments.

title: The Acorn
description: Marco gains a new ally while discovering the true extent of Fausto's reach. A disruption at a local bank provides new intel to our Detectives and Reporters. Charlotte & Ray discuss their future.

title: Eye of the Deep
description: Eva gives her deposition. Jim Dobbs' body is cremated. Marco gets the chance to have his revenge against David Tate.

title: Harvest of Souls
description: Eva's case hits a wall, putting Marco and Sonya in the cross-hairs. Jack Dobbs digs up his past. Frye makes a career move. Eva takes matters into her own hands.

title: Lamia
description: Sonya uncovers the truth behind Lisa's death. Meanwhile Frye and Adriana find a mystery.

title: Goliath
description: Sonya visits a stranger from her past while Marco's tainted history is unearthed. Frye takes a step too far. Eleanor's loyalties are tested. A move is made to apprehend Fausto.

title: Rakshasa
description: Marco tries to find Sonya and her kidnapper. Fausto makes his move against Eleanor.

title: Eidolon
description: With Charlotte dead and his children's safety on the line, Cesar begins to follow Eleanor's orders. Meanwhile, Hank fights for his life after being wounded in the Red Ridge's stand-off.

title: Beholder
description: Marco and the marines go after Fausto. Sonya interrogates Eleanor. Frye and Adriana discover new secrets about the CIA and the DEA activities on the border.

title: Quetzalcoatl
description: Marco becomes Fausto's ticket to freedom. Sonya attempts to interpret Eleanor's ledger. Frye & Adriana aid the EPPD investigation.

title: Jubilex
description: Marco, Fausto, Obregan and an ailing Romina try to make it through the woods. Sonya and Hank get closer to their targets. Eleanor gets her reward.
